In England, in the seven days to 07 April, there were 259,430 new confirmed cases (458.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 31 March, there were 424,143 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 39% (164,713 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 12 April is 18,248,680 (32,269.9 cases per 100,000 population).
